00036 static const char* XERCES_XML_INITIALIZATION_ERROR = "XERCES XML initialization error: ";
00037 static const char* UNABLE_TO_PARSE_CONFIGURATION_FILE = "Unable to parse configuration file: ";
00038 
00039 void Configuration::LoadConfigurationFile(string FileName)
00040 {
00041     m_par1CsvColumnName = "ChrX pseudo-autosomal region 1";
00042     m_par2CsvColumnName = "ChrX pseudo-autosomal region 2";
00043     m_parDbColumnName = "ChrX_PAR";
00044     m_parDbColumnType = DB_TYPE_INTEGER;
00045     std::string err_message =   UNABLE_TO_PARSE_CONFIGURATION_FILE;     
00046     err_message += FileName.c_str();
00047     err_message += ". ";
00048     
00049     try
00050         {
00051                 XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize();
00052         }
00053 
00054         catch (const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLException& xmlException)
00055         {       
00056             std::string message =       XERCES_XML_INITIALIZATION_ERROR;        
00057             message += ConfigFileHandler::ToStdString(xmlException.getMessage());
00058             
00059         throw Except(message.c_str());                                  
00060         }
00061         
00062         //
00063         //  Create a SAX parser object to use and create our SAX event handlers
00064         //  and plug them in.
00065         //
00066         SAX2XMLReader* parser = XMLReaderFactory::createXMLReader();
00067         ConfigFileHandler* const configFileHandler = new ConfigFileHandler(this);
00068         parser->setContentHandler(configFileHandler);
00069         parser->setErrorHandler(configFileHandler);
00070         parser->setFeature(XMLUni::fgSAX2CoreValidation, false);
00071     parser->setFeature(XMLUni::fgSAX2CoreNameSpaces, false);
00072                     
00073     try
00074         {
00075                 parser->parse(FileName.c_str());
00076                 int errorCount = parser->getErrorCount();
00077                 if (errorCount != 0)
00078                 {       
00079                         throw Except(err_message.c_str());
00080                 }
00081         }
00082         catch (SAXParseException& parseException)
00083         {
00084                 std::stringstream message;      
00085                 message << err_message.c_str();
00086             message << ConfigFileHandler::ToStdString(parseException.getMessage());
00087             message << ". Line " << parseException.getLineNumber() << ".";
00088                     
00089         throw Except(message.str().c_str());                    
00090         }
00091         
00092         catch (std::exception& exception)
00093         {
00094             err_message += exception.what();
00095             
00096         throw Except(err_message.c_str());                      
00097         }
00098         catch (...)
00099         {       
00100             err_message += "Unknown exception.";
00101             throw Except(err_message.c_str());  
00102         }
00103         delete configFileHandler;
00104         delete parser;
00105         XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();
00106 }

00108 bool Configuration::IsCloneableColumn(const string& ColumnName)
00109 {
00110     ColumnsCloningMap::iterator cloneableColumn  = m_columnsCloning.find(ColumnName);
00111     if (cloneableColumn != m_columnsCloning.end() && cloneableColumn->second.size() > 0)
00112     {        
00113       return true;                
00114     }
00115     
00116     return false;
00117 }
00118 
00119 std::vector<string> Configuration::GetColumnClones(const string& ColumnName)
00120 {
00121     ColumnsCloningMap::iterator cloneableColumn  = m_columnsCloning.find(ColumnName);
00122     if (cloneableColumn != m_columnsCloning.end())
00123     {
00124         return cloneableColumn->second;
00125     }
00126     vector<string> foo;
00127     return foo;
00128 }    
00129 
00130 void Configuration::ConvertTsvToDbValue(const string& ColumnName, string& ValueToConvert)
00131 {
00132     CsvToDbConversionMap::iterator columnsIterator;
00133     columnsIterator = m_csvToDbConversionMap.find(ColumnName);
00134     if (columnsIterator != m_csvToDbConversionMap.end())
00135     {
00136        map<string, string> csvValueDbValueMap = columnsIterator->second;// map<TsvValue, DbValue >
00137        map<string, string>::iterator tsvToDbIterator;
00138        tsvToDbIterator = csvValueDbValueMap.find(ValueToConvert);
00139        if (tsvToDbIterator != csvValueDbValueMap.end())
00140        {
00141             ValueToConvert = tsvToDbIterator->second;
00142        }
00143     }
00144 }   
00145 
00146 void Configuration::Clear()
00147 {
00148     CsvToDbConversionMap::iterator columnConversions;
00149     for (columnConversions = m_csvToDbConversionMap.begin(); columnConversions != m_csvToDbConversionMap.end(); columnConversions++) 
00150     {
00151         columnConversions->second.clear();        
00152     }
00153     
00154     m_csvToDbConversionMap.clear();
00155 }
00156 
00157 Configuration::~Configuration()
00158 {
00159     Clear();
00160 }
